si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් මිලදී ගැනීමේ මිල රු.

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was Rs 308.5844 and the sales price were 318.4655 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Tuesday (February 13).
